Cosi Fan Tutte [arr. Godfrey]
Strand Girls Grammar School, Whitefield, Lancashire 6th Annual Alexander Owen Brass Festival - sponsored by Besses o' th' Barn Band
March contest - 1st Wigan Borough, 2nd British Railways, 3rd Dobcross Prizes -1st £20 cup and shield, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £7 and cup, 4th £5 and cup, 5th £3. 5 bands competed.
Dec. 3, 2012, 11:33 a.m. March 29, 2020, 9:08 a.m.
